verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5117>given<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H340>enemies<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years,<s%>

that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for their <S%H2205>elders<s%> and their <S%H7218>heads<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I <S%H2204>am<s%> <S%H2204>old,<s%> <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years.<s%>

"And you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is He who has been <S%H3898>fighting<s%> for you.

<S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H5307>apportioned<s%> to you <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7604>remain<s%> as an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off,<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> even to the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> toward the <S%H3996>setting<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> He shall <S%H1920>thrust<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H3423>drive<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> you.

"Be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>firm,<s%> then, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so that you may not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from it to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%>

in order that you may not <S%H935>associate<s%> with <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> which <S%H7604>remain<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, or <S%H2142>mention<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> or make [anyone] <S%H7650>swear<s%> [by them,] or <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, or <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to them.
"But you are to <S%H1692>cling<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3423>driven<s%> out <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and as for you, <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H259>"One<s%> of your <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7291>puts<s%> to <S%H7291>flight<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is He who <S%H3898>fights<s%> for you, <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H1696>promised<s%> you.

"For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7725>ever<s%> <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H1692>cling<s%> to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> which <S%H7604>remain<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and <S%H2859>intermarry<s%> with them, so that you <S%H935>associate<s%> with them and they with you,

<S%H3045>know<s%> with <S%H3045>certainty<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will not <S%H3254>continue<s%> to <S%H3423>drive<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; but they shall be a <S%H6341>snare<s%> and a <S%H4170>trap<s%> to you, and a <S%H7850>whip<s%> on your <S%H6654>sides<s%> and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you perish from <S%H6>off<s%> <S%H5921>this<s%> <S%H2088>good<s%> <S%H2896>land<s%> <S%H127>which<s%> the <S%H834>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God<s%> has <S%H430>given<s%> you.

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and you <S%H3045>know<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%> that not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you has <S%H5307>failed;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> have been <S%H935>fulfilled<s%> for you, not <S%H259>one<s%> of them has <S%H5307>failed.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you have <S%H935>come<s%> upon you, <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>threats,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> He has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

"When you <S%H5674>transgress<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to them, then the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H2734>burn<s%> against you, and you shall perish <S%H6>quickly<s%> from <S%H4120>off<s%> the <S%H5921>good<s%> <S%H2896>land<s%> <S%H776>which<s%> He has <S%H834>given<s%> you."
